content:
I'm actually glad you stopped there. For the universal repository, it needs to have the actual links to GitHub, here is an example, just need to add the prefix to the https://github.com/palios-taey/palios-taey-nova/blob/main/docs/claude/cto_onboarding.md

I didn't actually want you to generate this, sorry for the confusion there, I wanted you to generate a script that would enable me to generate an updated version of the full directory so I can keep this current with every time I need to transition. If that means it has to be organized as it is currently, without moving charter and stuff to the top, that's fine. Continue
